website_summaries.verdict: Although pricey, these gloves combine genuine leather and stretchy fabric for a comfortable fit.
pros: Extra-thick padding provides comfort during heavy lifting
cons: They are slightly bulky, and they are also expensive

customer_reviews.title: Best Lifting Gloves I've Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these gloves 2-3 times per week for well over two years and they still perform flawlessly. I have been quite pleased with these gloves and would recommend them without hesitation to other lifters. However, be advised that these gloves do not provide much in the way of wrist support, so if that is important to you, then you may wish to choose something else or use a separate wrist support strap.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Ok gloves poor customer services
customer_reviews.text: Gloves only last about 5 months. Tried to contact customer services for warranty but no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: these will be a major adjustment at best. I put them on
customer_reviews.text: Take this review with a grain of salt, as I never actually used the gloves while working out. I’m just trying to save someone from the mistake I made. The complaints from other reviewers about the padding interfering with grip are valid. If you’re not accustomed to gloves with significant padding, these will be a major adjustment at best. I put them on, grabbed a barbell and knew immediately they weren’t going to work for me, and I have XL hands. That said, they get four stars because I have to put something and they seemed like a very well put together, quality set of gloves. Just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until I have used the gloves for a couple of weeks before I rate them, and I am impressed. I love the snug fit of the loves and I really love the long wrist straps, just be careful no to over tighten them. The chemical smell has finally started to subside, but it is still present after 6 weeks. The gloves come off with ease by using the pull tabs on the two middle fingers. The padded palms provide the much needed protection from the heavy weight of the bench press and dumbbells. I thought the price is a bit expensive, but thus far, the quality and comfort is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me!!
customer_reviews.text: Returned these because I did not like the wrap around wrist strap for support. I bought these with the expectation that they would last longer than the Bionic gloves I had previously purchased.
customer_reviews.author: James Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Best Weightlifting Gloves I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves. Perfect fit, great flexibility and the best padding ever. The rubber palm inserts are much better than gel padded gloves. Crown Gear also included rubber pads that I grip between the steel bar and gloves. Hooks on back of the middle 2 fingers help to remove gloves if you press the palm against your body. Sizing for weightlifting gloves is different from regular dress or outdoor gloves. I measure a men's medium, but wear men's large in weightlifting gloves and they fit like a second layer of skin -- as they should. This was true of my old Harbinger gel wrist wrap gloves and my new Crown Dominator gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Weightlifting Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are well-made of quality material and well padded. The padding aids in the gloves being more comfortable in Bench Presses or any exercise that requires lifting overhead. Dips are also less tiring on the hands due to the extra thickness of the gloves. The only drawback is that it makes it harder for me, since I have small hands, to grip the barbell or dumbbell with the extra padding in the palm of the glove. I ordered a size large, and they fit perfect. Wish that the fingers were a little longer which might aid in the ability to grip the barbell on deadlifts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Blevins

customer_reviews.title: very uncomfortable, too tight and i ordered them big ...
customer_reviews.text: very uncomfortable, too tight and i ordered them big enough, but hard to remove even if they fit me. I made a different choice.
customer_reviews.author: JP Hagans

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy gloves have good grip and are well made.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have strong grip and are pretty comfortable. I've had them a few months and they are wearing well. I would guess they'll outlast probably any other pair I've gotten. They do run a little small, I probably measured out at a large but didn't fit when I got it and had to go to XL. They tighten up more easily than you'd want too so I'd say buy these a size larger than you normally do and you'll be pleased. There's a seam that can be annoying where it wraps around the wrist, so if you order too small, I'll dig in and you won't enjoy these.
customer_reviews.author: I Eat Babies

customer_reviews.title: I want to love these things
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these things, but if you're like me (medium sized hands), you may find that the thickness of these gloves make grip an issue. I work out at LA Fitness, and the bars there are already on the thicker side (1500 lb olympic standards). Instead of increasing grip, I find that they don't quite perform to the standard I was anticipating. I can appreciate the design, but unless you've got large scale hands, I'd consider yourself warned. Quality construction though, and I imagine that they work excellent for large and above hands.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleTyler

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of gloves but exchange policy sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of gloves. Fits nicely and the wrap around the wrist is very very good. Hope it lasts long because right now I am loving it. BUT BEWARE if you order the wrong size and need to exchange - You'll have to pay shipping to the tune of almost $8.00 which is like more than 20% of the product's price. I had to do it and absolutely hated paying so much.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyMan

customer_reviews.title: The Best Glove Ever
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, these are the best weightlifting gloves that I have ever purchased. I've used just about every brand of glove made over the last 30 years and will never buy any other brand in the future. They are durable, well fitting and look god as well. I have already asked my wife to get me another pair for Christmas. I have been using them for about 4 months; five mornings a week and they have held up very well. Easy to put on and get off. No stains on my skin as other brands have done. Very well made and worth every penny. Give them a try and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hughes

customer_reviews.title: IF it is I will just suck it up and chalk it up as a bad ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cumbersome gloves for me. Ive tried them three times in the gym and have to take them off each time. These were a Christmas gift I received several weeks before the holiday so I did not use them until Christmas. Too late to return them? IF it is I will just suck it up and chalk it up as a bad purchase. They are a good quality glove I am sure., but not for me' Ill probably give them away to someone in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are amazing. They are the most expensive gloves that I've ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are amazing. They are the most expensive gloves that I've ever bought but are so worth it. I weight train 3 times a week and I find that these gloves are padded in the right areas without bulk. Since I started deadlifting recently the strap gives me much needed wrist support and I find that I am able to lift more weight with more reps with proper use. If you have been using chalk like I have been using, it is time to upgrade. You won't go back. I'm saying this after shredding through 2 pairs of gloves before and I average 300 lb bench. If you weight lift, you need these, period.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J.

customer_reviews.title: Best glove I ever used
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this by saying that I have been a weightlifter for over 50 years, and have gone through literally hundreds of gloves. I bought these almost two years ago, and there is not even a missing stitch yet. Well worth the extra cost. I always buy gloves x large, as they always seem to come smaller than they should. These are a bit roomier, and if I ever need another pair, would probably get a large. Doubt if I will need to. These gloves will probably be around after me
customer_reviews.author: J. Arcara

customer_reviews.title: Best Gloves ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I have been lifting weights since 1975 and these are by far the best pair of lifting gloves I have ever owned. They fit perfectly and felt great from the first time I put them on. I love the padding on them. They really protect your hands and make lifting a pleasure. They are also are easy to take off. I can only hope they last. I highly recommend these to anyone who lifts a lot of weights. If I could give these 6 stars I would. They are that good of a product.
customer_reviews.author: One Way

customer_reviews.title: Best in the market
customer_reviews.text: Wow best glove ever I had them all harbinger , skott brand (Bad worst glove stay away !!!)! And so on these are in a class of their own the material leather wow and design so nice and modern so happy with my purchase. The gloves are heavy duty and I get compliments for the looks almost everytime I wear them ( great customer service to) good to see when a company stands full behind their product recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Hector R.

customer_reviews.title: The 3rd pair is in good shape so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair that I bought, the first pair I had to return because there was a hole on the fabric section of the gloves between the thumb and the index finger....the second pair I still have but the grip "plastic" section around your palms are detaching from the fabric material and the Velcro are also detaching from the wrist section in strips by strips...I had to put some plastic glue to prevent further damage, the warranty on the Amazon side for this purchased is 30 days according to their policy, now on the manufacture side not sure. Can someone follow up on the warranty for my second pair...The 3rd pair is in good shape so far...
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Husband LOVES these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Xmas last year. He's been working out for twenty years and said these were the BEST gloves he's ever had!! He said the padding all over makes such a difference and the wrist straps are very comfortable and do a great job. I'm just now replacing them because they had gotten too stinky and when he washed them, they made his hands black. The price is good enough that it's not a big deal to replace them every six months.
customer_reviews.author: Susann B

customer_reviews.title: 10 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect! Construction is amazing. Rugged with all the pads in just the right places. Absolutely love these gloves. They have improved my weight game tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Paw Paw

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Oh these are indeed very nice gloves. A bit pricey, but you'll be glad you bought them. Very thoughtfully designed with attention to detail. The padding is great, the rubber allows you to hold a tight grip saying no more to calluses. To boot, they're very cool-looking. By the way, they arrived way before they were supposed to!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: I've been using my gloves for 6 weeks now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my gloves for 6 weeks now and the stitches are coming off already. I expect more quality for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: carlitos

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my new gloves. This is the second pair of these I have had. First ones were stolen out of my car. Well leased with both pair.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Choplin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very well made gloves with thick padding. They're ideal for bench pressing and anything you need extra grip/support for. Comfortable and don't move while lifting. Love the red/black colors. Been lasting for years and still going
customer_reviews.author: Hairylegs222

customer_reviews.title: Best powerlifting gloves ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best gloves I have ever had or used and i have had gloves by Nike, Harbinger and Gasp but these peovide awesome padding for my powerlifting needs. Belive it or not they are durable so i dont understand how some peiple say they fall apart as I have had mine since October and they are intact. I tend to get new gloves after a year or 2 because of the heavyweight the padding just wears out which is expected, but all my pairs going forward will be this glove.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Protect your hands & make your girl happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of workout gloves I've ever had!!! Great grip, no slipping , fits like a glove & protects the wrist. Although My callus spots still hurt, if I would of had Crown gloves in the beginning I don't believe I would have calluses today. You spend a lot of money on proteins & pre-workouts why not spend the extra money to protect your hands!!! I will never go back to the cheap stuff again, just a waste of money & time
customer_reviews.author: Darrell McLeod

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are excellent for those who do heavy lifting and are looking ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are excellent for those who do heavy lifting and are looking for extra padding on the palms and fingers. They feel a bit stiff, but I prefer that for the type of lifting I do. The wrist straps offer extra stability which help for many exercises. The gloves are doubled stitched in the areas that typically fall apart first on gym gloves. I have only had them a few days now but I will post an update after I abuse them a little.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Parker

customer_reviews.title: Restricted With Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: These look cool although not as high-tech/metallic as the photos. I love the finger grips that allow you to pull the gloves off easily. My wrist feels restricted especially with my Apple Watch on. So I'll use these at my home gym and a lighter pair at my main gym. But I don't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Young

customer_reviews.title: I love them! My hands and wrists felt really good
customer_reviews.text: I just received the gloves yesterday, right before I was about to start my workout. I had purchased them off of a recommendation from a friend, hoping they would alleviate the wrist and finger pain I was having. I love them! My hands and wrists felt really good, and the weights weren't hard to hold onto at all, for the first time since I started lifting heavy! I smashed my workout, instead of having to go easy to spare my hands and wrists the pain! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Bonsol

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY GLOVE TO BUY!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are the BEST! I have bad wrists and these gloves give me all the support needed. The padding on the palms make it easy and comfortable while lifting weights. The way the gloves are designed make them so quick and easy to remove which I really appreciate because most gloves I have owned is so frustrating when time to remove. These are the only gloves I will ever own.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: He said these are by far the best he's ever tried
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has been working out for over 10 years and has gone through various gloves. He said these are by far the best he's ever tried. First of all, after all that sweating, the gloves don't smell. That's a big plus. Also, the wrist wrap provides additional support when lifting. I'll be buying couple more soon to keep in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Yun L.

customer_reviews.title: Best workout gloves you will ever own
customer_reviews.text: I have been lifting for 20+ years and have been through many different types of gloves and straps. These are by far superior to any lifting gloves I have ever owned. I had my current pair for over a year and they have held up amazingly. They have a built in wrist strap for optional wrist support and if you don't want the wrist support when working forearms it is easy to just loosen the straps. I looked long and hard for the perfect glove and have found it and won't use anything else from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Manjako

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are not good, the first week I got them the stitching ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are not good, the first week I got them the stitching started to come a loose, if I cared as much I would have sent them back and went with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dejuan Byrdsong

customer_reviews.title: Not so good for pulling exercises.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give these 4 of 5 stars is due to the lack of durability while doing pulling exercises. If you lift heavier weights the padding on the palms will come apart relatively quickly. I have found that the vast majority, if not all, back exercises will tear them apart. Curls, i'm on the fence about. Most shoulder exercises, except for shrugs, are good with these. Any presses they are outstanding! They are easily the most comfortable gloves I have ever used! If you are not a heavy lifter, they should last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: William Krock

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to purchase this gloves and they are really good product and it live much longer than any other product i have ever tried
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I bought this OVER PRICE gloves, thinking they will last longer than the $9.99 ones,but they didn't. TWO months, and they are falling apart alredy. SELLER did not reply back to my email. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY and TIME.
customer_reviews.author: dvmcdo

customer_reviews.title: Solid workout gloves
customer_reviews.text: I've used these now for about a month. The grip is nice and they are easy to remove after a sweaty workout. I was hoping the wrist straps would be more supportive. They wrap around my wrist twice with two separate points of velcro, but it's strange how little they actually support my wrist. I actually prefer just the standard $5 wrist wraps as far as support. The gloves are nice overall and I'll continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA J BAKER

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are well constructed.  However,..
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are well constructed. However, the either Velcro of wrap or rough edges irritated me under the base of my thumps. At first I could not figure out what caused red spots around that areas for both my hands. After I figured out and switched back to my old gloves, my red spots are gone. If the first wrap do not have Velcro or rough edges in that area then it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Easyflier

customer_reviews.title: So far, so great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so great. Extremely comfy for those heavy lifts. Time will tell if they last but with the 1yr replacement it seems like a great deal. The wrist wraps are pretty good but I keep them fairly loose most of the time and only use them for super heavy lifting or 1RMs.
customer_reviews.author: Typhoid Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Gloves work great; wear them during warm up to soften leather. I can grip & do pull ups without feeling bar at all; allow me to use during lifting without having calluses or "man hands"
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Not real leather but still decent
customer_reviews.text: I've now had two pairs of these glove the first pair lasted almost two years but after almost a year began to rip. I believe they might have adjusted sizes because medium is a bit snug now or it needs stretched out. THESE GLOVES ARE NOT GENUINE LEATHER THOUGH SO THAT IS MISLEADING
customer_reviews.author: pattyshaw

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: It took about maybe a week for them to break in, but after that they felt and fit perfect. The padding on the bottom has me spoiled and I can never buy another glove without it. If you are contemplating this glove vs another, go with this one right now!
customer_reviews.author: XinoteK

customer_reviews.title: Best work out gloves, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Arrived earlier than expected. Best gloves in the world for Kettlebell workouts! Worth every penny! I have bad wrists, and these gloves give me excellent support, while also protecting my arms from the kettlebell during cleans and squats. Thanks to the extra padding in the palms, my calluses are also softening since I started using these gloves. My old gloves constantly gave me blisters and calluses. I also love, love, LOVE the pulloff feature, allowing for a quick transition from workout to cool-down, without spending an extra two minutes trying to pry sweaty gloves off my hands. I'm recommending these to all my CrossFit and Kettlebell friends!
customer_reviews.author: D. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered ex-large and they are way to small. have trouble getting them on and taking them off, other than that very well made glove then have to use them for awhile to give rating.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: I go through at least three pair of lifting gloves ...
customer_reviews.text: I go through at least three pair of lifting gloves a year until I purchased these. They are well made, ultra strong and padded well. I will be ordering these again when I need another pair. They sure beat the gloves you buy at the sporting goods store that rip and fall apart after just a few months!
customer_reviews.author: MJW

customer_reviews.title: I love that these are of very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are of very good quality. I love the features and wish they had more color options. Also, could you make some without the added wrist supports? Sometimes you don't need that but want the very high quality gloves still.
customer_reviews.author: Pharaoh

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife, she loves them. Very comfortable, very functional. To soon to comment on there durability.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ucciardi III

customer_reviews.title: Horrible horrible horrible
customer_reviews.text: sub standard gloves made with v poor quality materials and it stinks in no time like ur wearing a dead animal around ur hand.. Also the color leaks on the hands.. I had black dye on my hands for days and the rashes due to it.. Forget returning it I just threw them.. Pls don't buy.. V v sad.. I had v high expectations from this product.. But within a month it's destroyed.. V v sad!!!
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: materials are really high, the only negative point is ...
customer_reviews.text: materials are really high, the only negative point is to make sure of your hands size, I ordered XL assuming it will be a bodybuilder hands :) it is slightly tight on my hands but it will get bigger by usage.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: You really can lift more
customer_reviews.text: Just used the gloves for the first time, they shipped the wrong size (s) luckily they fitted well but it take some effort to put them on (even with my big hands). The padding in the palm section is amazing you can lift heavy weight with out any pain in the hands and basically lift until your hands are fatigued. The wrist straps give additional support as well for heavy lifts. I believe as I used them more they will become more flexible and comfortable. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Vidales

customer_reviews.title: Lifting gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit a little snug. And the rubber pads on the fingers are thick and strong. One thing that is really nice is the pockets on the back of the fingers that allows you to use the opposite hand to peel sweaty gloves off your fingers a real time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fast shipping. Made of genuine leather. I cannot even feel the dumbbells when I left them with zero chance of callus formation on my hands. I highly recommend this product and hope that everybody would switch to it since it's wanted the greatest weightlifting gloves I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Twana

customer_reviews.title: So good, so far
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good, used them a few times. They look sturdy for now. I measured my hand using their charts and they fit perfectly. Let`s see how they behave after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and cool!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves rock. I've bought a number of different work out gloves. These work and fit great. Had them for a few months and they haven't started to fall apart. That's a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: best gloves ive ever worn- 13 years army ranger- just ...
customer_reviews.text: best gloves ive ever worn- 13 years army ranger- just wish i had gotten an XL -if you dont know they are super tigh(as supposed to be; however, as i am 6ft 4 w larger hands i should have known better, i just dont buy many gloves
customer_reviews.author: dean kanellis

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves in the gym!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these gloves for my husband for father's day. He loves them, comfortable and saves his hands while he's lifting weights!
customer_reviews.author: P.J. Morris

customer_reviews.title: hmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Been using these babies for a few months now... I lift heavy so I needed good sturdy gloves but after only 2 months they started to come apart... I'm in the process of getting a new set through their warranty. We'll see how this goes.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I exercise 6 days a week and lift on atleast 3 of those days. Im a female with a small frame so the wrist support is a must when weight training. Im sure this is also true for anyone that does serious heavy lifting. Very comfortable and love the extra wrist support! Definitely worth the price if you want quality lifting gloves that provide wrist support.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of workout gloves
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pair of workout gloves. The middle and ring finger pullout tab is ingenious as it makes removing the gloves easy. Great wrist support and good ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: phaseMark

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I have put these gloves through there paces for the past 6 months. They are really comfortable and durable. I live the pull slips on the fingers to easily take off the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: The raised rubber grips on the palms are so thick ...
customer_reviews.text: The raised rubber grips on the palms are so thick that with a lot of weight they float while trying to do deadlifts making the bar slip in my hands. To compensate this I started reversing my hand grip. I think I will try a full thin leather grove. In my shop we use a mechanic glove that would probably work well but it doesn't have the rubber to prevent slipping.
customer_reviews.author: David Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We have had our fair share of bad and good gym gloves. Lord knows Ive gone through my share. I find these to be perfect and well built. I feel its a bit pricy but at the same time the quality is there. Lets see how long they last now
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend these gloves for anybody or any type of lifting or training. Very well made and very comfortable. Couldn't ask for any better. The wrist straps are great the gloves have very good grip and padding. At 1st it may catch you off guard because of the padding in the palms of your hands but I feel like I grip things tighter and better because of it and I've just gotten very use to it. But all around 5 stars, love the gloves. Very happy with the purchase, money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Chase M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I've only been using these gloves for about ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've only been using these gloves for about 2 weeks now. As of now the quality seems great. The only problem I'm having right now with them is i have very wide palms with short fingers and the padding is so thick that it's hard for me to grip my weights securely; this is actually improving over time with the usage of the glove.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for heavy and everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these gloves for a good year and a half and after heavy use they are slowly starting to come apart. I highly recommend these gloves, I've never had a longer lasting pair other than these ones. I usually would need to replace my weight lifting gloves every 6 months or so but since these have out lasted every pair I've ever had I am most definitely going to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Blanco-Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent product !!!!!!! Best gloves I've ever had !!!!!! I recommend 10 stars for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints, All Pros
customer_reviews.text: Most places sell weight lifting gloves for around 20$ but honestly when you spend double the money on a legit pair of gloves you get double if not more quality. I love these gloves and plan to use them for many years. Great products and I would definitely recommend their stuff to people.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: These gloves suck . I went through two pairs in 6 months ( 2nd pair was a replacement from seller after complaining). Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Typhoon1492

customer_reviews.title: Best Gloves I Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: I work out six times a week. I have to say this gloves are wroth the price they are. In past I spend a lot of money towards gloves buying from local stores, but it was not wroth it after three to six month the gloves start to wore off, i was getting calluses. when i start using this gloves it made me feel so comfortable, I am doing more reps with these gloves because they feel so comfortable. you will not find this type of gloves in local sport store in your area. I have to say every penny I spend it wroth it. THANKS CROWN GEAR !
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST WEIGHTLIFTING GLOVES I HAVE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these at first because of the high price but believe me, this product is the rolls royce of weightlifting gloves-they come off after a hard workout very easily by using the outside finger holes
customer_reviews.author: MRBARBARYCOAST

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gloves I've ever used. I've used brands like Harbinger and Valeo. This one has a lot of cushion without being too bulky. the finger tabs and wrist straps and pads are also very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Gloves last long. Seller/company stands by its product.
customer_reviews.text: I had these gloves for almost a year. I just had an issue with one of the gloves. Contacted seller. Seller responded within a day and I had the replacement gloves like 3 days after. I recommend it because: 1. These gloves last long AND when I had an issue, the seller took care really fast.
customer_reviews.author: MysteryShopper

customer_reviews.title: Best Gloves I have Found Yet!
customer_reviews.text: My wrists have been my weak point for years. These gloves make all the difference. The wrist band is wide enough to support the entire area and they are easy to get tight and remain tight even after several lifts. Overall, the material is soft and comfortable. I think these are good for just general lifting but if you have wrist trouble like me, you should definitely give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: but I was a little disappointed on how the stitches on top of both gloves ...
customer_reviews.text: Over-all this should've been a 5-star for me, but I was a little disappointed on how the stitches on top of both gloves got busted easily with just a single use... I would suggest Crown Gear to improve and strengthen the quality of the stitches on your gloves since this is designed and intended for heavy lifting and training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: They have great padding and wrist support. I wish the fingers were a little longer and it is too soon to tell if it was worth the money that depends on how long they last. A little concerned with all the seams where it might come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: The gloves fit nice bar grip with gloves is good not sure how ...
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit nice bar grip with gloves is good not sure how they will hold up since I have only used them a week and the stitching is already coming out on the top of the 1 glove
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: THE ONLY TRUE PREMIUM WEIGHTLIFTING GLOVE
customer_reviews.text: This glove far exceeds any other similar product currently on the marketplace. Quality stitching, thick padding and rubber grip areas. And the one year warranty is a welcome bonus. A MUST BUY.
customer_reviews.author: SnS

customer_reviews.title: Grip is awesome and prevent me from getting those annoying blisters in ...
customer_reviews.text: Work as they are supposed to. Grip is awesome and prevent me from getting those annoying blisters in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: excellent gloves. Very padded and great writst support
customer_reviews.text: excellent gloves. Very padded and great writst support. One of the best weightlifting gloves I have found. Great for lifting heavy weights. I would definitely buy these again. Leather is sturdy and very supportive and protective.
customer_reviews.author: MerneeJ.Mcelhinny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vendor that actually cares about their product. The fact that I actually received an email from them about how the products and safety tips when lifting was a real nice feature. Also I used the gloves I fractured my wrist 3 months back with these gloves did not feel any pain at all! "
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Gloves are excellent! Pure leather
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are excellent! Pure leather, extra padding where is needed with out losing sensitivity and grip. Must have ! The warranty of one year is unparalleled .. No brainer
customer_reviews.author: Fernando N

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves for everything strength and weight training related
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves for everything strength and weight training related. Thicker than most with good coverage of the hands and fingers and durable, but not cumbersome or clunky. Plus u feel kinda bad ass when you're wearing them. ;) So far so good. I think they'll stand the test of time too...
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: awesome weight lifting gloves
customer_reviews.text: excellent gloves! this is the second set I have purchased!
customer_reviews.author: kaylanng

customer_reviews.title: torn a part with just a minimal use
customer_reviews.text: XL is my Palm size so the XL gloves fits right. the cushion on palms were so delicate and got easily get torn apart. not worthy enough for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: vamsi krishna garimella

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: i love the gloves, offer great wrist support and wonderful padding on the inside of the hand. Very comfortable to wear and easy pull off with the small handles on the 2 middle fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Starrow

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these because they got such great reviews. Normally don't go for wrist-wrap/glove combos but decided to take a chance. On my second workout, the palm grip blew out. Next time I am ready to drop a chunk of change on weightlifting gloves, it certainly won't be these.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Redabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: Good supportive training gloves. I am a novice and needed support for a left thumb joint. These gloves give me what I need to continue training.
customer_reviews.author: E. Walden

customer_reviews.title: Well I just got mine and when I opened it ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I just got mine and when I opened it I was impressed by the quality of these gloves and surprised how fast it shipped but none of that matters when you come to find out its torn it's not that much but paying around $50 it does kinda matter
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Lifting glove
customer_reviews.text: These were so nice someone stole them! The wrist supports were great and the padding was not excessive.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.text: We purchased these because my daughter hurt her wrist lifting. She says these gloves give her great support and are very comfortable. She has recommended them to friends.
customer_reviews.author: C. Duggins

customer_reviews.title: Not so great anymore
customer_reviews.text: The gloves worked great for about a month. After that they stared falling apart and the leather on my right glove ripped. Very dissapointed in these gloves. I will NOT buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Buy&Fly

customer_reviews.title: Only gloves you will ever want to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding gloves. Great fit and the quality is excellent. Only gloves I'm aware of that comes with a 1 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: johbro

customer_reviews.title: ... 17 plus years and these are by far the BEST workout gloves Ive ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have been weight training for 17 plus years and these are by far the BEST workout gloves Ive ever purchased. Very comfortable with phenomenal wrist support. I would recommend these gloves for anyone, from newbies to professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cowen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommended! Fits great. Very resistent. Quality material. Totally comfortable. Awesome color. It's everything that was advertised and more! Don't hesitate to buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy T.

customer_reviews.title: I love the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 pair of these gloves. I love the look and feel. however the thread starts coming apart in a couple of area's after a few months of use. I still buy them coz i like them. and I sew them up myself when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hamner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritic hands and these gloves work well for most (but not all) CrossFit routines.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: so good. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. No complaints. I have had these gloves for a few weeks and have done a few workouts in them. The weights feel great in my hands! I highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Love at first lift!
customer_reviews.text: I've been working out with my gloves and I love them. They fit as described, are made well and the inserts on the palms help tremendously with grip. One of the features I didn't have on old gloves are the tabs on back for easy removal. Great idea. They're unobtrusive, effective and remove the struggle of fighting with the glove to remove. Also the wrist guard with its double closure is infinitely adjustable and once you close it, it stays closed. Overall a great value despite its above average cost. They will last longer, they will help protect my hands and they look great. They are a value because they deliver on what the promise.
customer_reviews.author: Saro T.

customer_reviews.title: not gorilla fists like mine.
customer_reviews.text: These run tight, I sold them to my lifting partner, he swears by them. They are for petite hands, not gorilla fists like mine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bybee

customer_reviews.title: sized for children
customer_reviews.text: Well made but runs extremly small like womens or childsize. Ordered the Extra Large and had to struggle to get it on. Returned item
customer_reviews.author: Richard Earl Hoffman

product_meta.title: Weightlifting Gloves for Gym Fitness Bodybuilding - Dominator Leather Crossfit Cross Training Gloves W. Wrist Strap Wrap - Best Weight Lifting Gloves with Wrist Support for Heavy Lifting
product_meta.description:
Crown Gear Dominator Weight Lifting Gloves - Your One Stop Solution to Your Grip, Calluses, Wrist Support Challenges:

A Premium Product:

Crown Gear weightlifting gloves are easy to remove and comfortable to wear. Durable and practical, they allow you to work beyond your natural grip limit, so you can work out the muscle groups you're targeting, not just your hands. Leather panels linked with stretch material give a close fit while allowing ease of movement so these gloves will be comfortable and effective throughout your workout. The Most Technically Innovative Workout gloves Ever Made:

- Ultimate Grip on the Bar - Articulated Rubber Grip Design for Natural, Flexed Hand Position 
- Comfort & Control - Rubber Padding Provides Extreme Comfort, Better Traction, Vibration Reduction and Sturdiness 
- Extra Long Wrist Wrap Integrates the Entire Hand for Maximum Stability and Wrist Support During Heavy Weight Exercises 
- "Pull-Off" Overlap System for Easy Removal 
- Soft Genuine Leather and Longer Finger Coverage that Prevent Calluses and Blisters on Hands We Know You Will Love It or Return within 30 Days for a Full Refund

Click On the "Add to Cart" Button On Top of the Page to ORDER NOW
feature_bullets: GENUINE SOFT LEATHER - SUPERIOR DURABLE STITCHING - Unbeatable Grip Enhancement - Crown Gear Dominator gloves can significantly improve your grip, allowing you to lift heavier weights, do more reps and meet your goals sooner. The effect is particularly noticeable if you tend to sweat as moisture can make weights slip, even causing injury.

4-WAY STRETCH FABRIC - Provide Multi-Directional Stretching & Comfort - "EZ Pull-off" System for Easy Removal -DOMINATOR gloves are easy to remove and comfortable to wear. Durable and practical, they allow you to work beyond your natural grip limit, so you can work out the muscle groups you're targeting, not just your hands. Leather panels linked with stretch material give a close fit while allowing ease of movement so these gloves will be comfortable and effective throughout your workout.

STRATEGICALLY PADDED - Reduce Pressure & Prevent Calluses and Blisters on Hands - Make your weightlifting workout more comfortable and more effective with premium Crown Gear weightlifting gloves. Made of soft leather with strategic padding, our weightlifting gloves can significantly improve your grip. Cleverly designed to minimise blisters and calluses, these are weightlifting gloves with built-in wrist support.

With INTEGRATED WRIST SUPPORT and strategic padding, Crown Gear weightlifting gloves provide protection on all fronts. These gloves are comfortable to wear, easy to get on and off and can prevent blisters and calluses as well as reducing the risk of wrist injury. The sleek black and red design means they look good at the gym. Attention has been paid to every detail.
